title: My keys are glitched
body:
I think my keys are glitch. I have been playing since October 2015 and ever since chest and keys have been released they have worked perfectly fine. Recently on this account I have been playing for about 2 weeks and have not got any keys. I have played this game a lot lately bec its summer so I have free time. I have won and loss and still over 2 weeks i havent earned 1 single key fragment i have earned chest but no key fragments. Plz help me if u know id my keys are glitched                                                                
                                                                      Sorry about bad grammar and spelling just in a rush. thanks in advance.

replies.body:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide
> 
> Feels like I'm not getting many key fragments anymore. What gives?
> 
> The drop rate for key fragments is a curve, not a line. With each fragment you earn, the chance to earn your next one goes down slightly. This number resets roughly every thirty days after you earn your first key fragment.
> 
> We wanted to give players who didn't play as frequently a good drop rate for keys, without making it feel like farming was mandatory if you wanted keys.

Quality post right here. Thanks, Zombiemaster!
